org.openscience.cdk.controller
Class Controller2DHub

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.controller.Controller2DHub
All Implemented Interfaces:
IChemModelRelay, IMouseEventRelay
public class Controller2DHub
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMouseEventRelay, IChemModelRelay

Class that will central interaction point between a mouse event throwing widget (SWT or Swing) and the Controller2D modules.

FIXME: will replace the old Controller2D class.

Author:
Niels Out, egonw
Belongs to CDK module:
control
Source code:
revision 9162
